Wand, common
This slim, metal wand is topped with a cage shaped like a three-sided pyramid. An eye of glass sits within the pyramid. The wand has 3 charges. While holding it, you can use an action to expend 1 of its charges to cast the @UUID[Compendium.black-flag.spells.Item.LGHPueVAi4bMnmFc]{guidance} spell from it. The wand regains all expended charges at dawn. If you expend the wand's last charge, roll a d20. On a 1, the wand transforms into a @UUID[Compendium.koboldpressogl-bf.koboldpressitems.Item.KPwandofresistan]{wand of resistance}.
